items.sentence: It's not that hard to understand why Tom didn't want to do that.
Another hunter accidentally killed Tom while he was out hunting.
Tom is the only one that would know the answer to that question.
Tom miraculously beat the odds and went into complete remission.
I realized that Tom wasn't laughing and wondered what was wrong.
Tom doesn't get along well with the other children in his class.
Whatever happened between Tom and me isn't any of your business.
He's a very romantic boyfriend who brings me flowers each night.
Tom's clarinet-playing has improved since I last heard him play.
There are many things in life that are more important than work.
